com.ronny.ludo.communication
Class TeamMessageMgr

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.ronny.ludo.communication.TeamMessageMgr
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITeamMessageManager, java.lang.Runnable
public class TeamMessageMgr
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ITeamMessageManager

Copyright: (c) 2011 Ronny Heitmann Andersen, Ronny Ã˜vereng and Karl-Erik Moberg The TeamMessageMgr is managing socket connections between collaborating clients. The manager may act as a server for creating the initial connection pool of (connecting) clients, but may also act as a client. The connection and connection behavior is transparent. For debugging: adb -s emulator-5556 forward tcp:11700 tcp:11700
